flavorText: The Viridian elves had purged their culture of the trolls' traitorous influence. In times of strife, however, the ancestral memories returned.

foreignData.flavorText: Die viridischen Elfen hatten sämtlichen Einfluss der verräterischen Trolle auf ihre Kultur ausgelöscht. In Zeiten des Konfliktes kam das Wissen der Ahnen zurück.
foreignData.name: Tel-Jilad-Widerstand
foreignData.text:
Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Schutz vor Artefakten bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Los elfos viridianos purgaron de su cultura la influencia traidora de los trols. Pero en tiempos conflictivos, las memorias ancestrales regresaron.
foreignData.name: Desafío de Tel-Jilad
foreignData.text:
La criatura objetivo gana protección contra artefactos hasta el final del turno.
Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Les elfes viridians avaient purgé leur culture de l'influence traîtresse des trolls. Cependant, en temps de conflit, ils recouvraient leur mémoire ancestrale.
foreignData.name: Défi de Tel-Jilad
foreignData.text:
La créature ciblée acquiert la protection contre les artefacts jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli elfi Viridiani avevano purgato la loro cultura dall'influenza traditrice dei troll. In periodi di conflitto, però, i ricordi ancestrali tornano in mente.
foreignData.name: Provocazione di Tel-Jilad
foreignData.text:
Una creatura bersaglio ha protezione dagli artefatti fino alla fine del turno.
Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: ヴィリジアンのエルフは、トロール達の不実な影響の文化を粛清していった。 しかし、この対立の時代に、古代の記憶がよみがえってきた。
foreignData.name: テル＝ジラードの抵抗
foreignData.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時までプロテクション（アーティファクト）を得る。
カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: Os elfos viridianos purificaram sua cultura da influência traiçoeira dos trols. Mas nos períodos de conflito, as memórias ancestrais voltaram.
foreignData.name: Desafio de Tel-Jilad
foreignData.text:
A criatura alvo ganha proteção contra artefatos até o final do turno.
Compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: Виридийские эльфы очистили свою культуру от влияния предателей троллей. И все же, во времена борьбы воспоминания предков начали возвращаться.
foreignData.name: Тел-Джиладский Вызов
foreignData.text:
Целевое существо получает Защиту от артефактов до конца хода.
Возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 暗碧族妖精文化中遭食人魔叛徒影响的部分，已经全盘净化。 不过在纷乱时代中，这些先祖的记忆又回来了。
foreignData.name: 泰几朗式反抗
foreignData.text:
目标生物获得反神器保护异能直到回合结束。
抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 暗碧族妖精文化中遭食人魔叛徒影響的部分，已經全盤淨化。 不過在紛亂時代中，這些先祖的記憶又回來了。
foreignData.name: 泰幾朗式反抗
foreignData.text:
目標生物獲得反神器保護異能直到回合結束。
抽一張牌。

name: Tel-Jilad Defiance
originalText:
Target creature gains protection from artifacts until end of turn.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: “Protection from artifacts” means the following: -- The affected creature can't be blocked by artifact creatures. -- The affected creature can't be equipped. If any Equipment are attached to it, they become unattached. The affected creature also can't be enchanted by Auras that have somehow become artifacts in addition to enchantments. -- The affected creature can't be targeted by abilities from artifact sources. -- All damage that would be dealt to the affected creature by artifact sources is prevented.

text:
Target creature gains protection from artifacts until end of turn.
Draw a card.
